bot_description: Discord Bot to send memes (and more). Created by EEI-Students@FAU

refresh.help: This command will get the newest memes for you

meme.brief: Sends a meme into the channel you requested
meme.help: Your message will be deleted and a meme will be sent

nsfw.brief: Sends a not safe for work picture ;)
nsfw.help: Your message will be deleted and a naugthy picture will be sent. Use !nsfw on or !nsfw off to turn the spoiler-function on/off

comic.brief: WIP: Sends you a random comic
comic.help: WIP: Deletes your message and sends a comic. Currently supported comic-sites: xkcd

bonk.help: Usage: !bonk <User>	 Bonks the <User>, probably for good reason
